clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
In order to use particular services that we offer, you may need to submit certain personal information such as your email address, name, address, telephone number, gender and date of birth.
You may be asked to submit further information from time to time.
If you connect your Facebook or Twitter accounts to your account with Letterboxd, we will access these accounts to identify which of your friends on those services are also using Letterboxd.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text: browser type, operating system, the referring web page, pages visited, location, your mobile carrier, device information (including device and application IDs), search terms, and cookie information.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: This service can license user content to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: sub-licensable

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: This service keeps a license on user-generated content even after users close their accounts.
clauses.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.
clauses.clause_text: perpetual

case.text: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
Where the laws of your country allow you to do so, you authorize us to transfer, store, and use your data in the United States, New Zealand and any other country where we might operate.
In some of the countries to which we transfer personal data, the privacy and data protection laws and rules regarding when government authorities may access data may vary from those of your country.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent
clauses.description: The service does not share user information with any third parties unless users specifically give it permission to do so.
clauses.clause_text:
